first_para: Adrian Mark Sanders (born 25 April 1959, Paignton) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Torbay in Devon.

full.extract:
Adrian Mark Sanders (born 25 April 1959, Paignton) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Torbay in Devon.
^ The Register of Members' Financial Interests: Part 2 As at 24 January 2011 UK Parliament
full.title: Adrian Sanders
